title: Ci Yuan Zhai Vegetarian Restaurant
description: Open summer of 2013, this vegetarian restaurant is located outside Dali Old Town close to the South Gate. Family-owned and operated, has Wi-Fi. Buddhist style comfortable atmosphere. Extensive menu with photos of dishes presented on an ipad. Also has a guesthouse in the same building run by the family. Name in Chinese: 古城慈缘斋素食馆. Address in Chinese: 大理市古城一塔路19号(近古城南门，博爱门).
